name: Course on S-Block, Hydrogen & its Compounds - IIT JEE
description: Piyush Maheshwari will cover the topic of S-Block, hydrogen & its compounds. It will be helpful for aspirants preparing for the IIT JEE exam. Learners at any stage of their preparation will benefit from the course. The course is for 10 days with 5 classes and the duration of each session is 90 minutes. The session will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

author.bio: A mentor to AIR 1, four 100 percentilers in JEE Mains and a guiding light to 10k+ IITians- all of these add to his exceptional achievements.
